Class javax.speech.EngineStateError 

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Throwable
        |
        +--java.lang.Error
              |
              +--javax.speech.SpeechError
                    |
                    +--javax.speech.EngineStateError
public class EngineStateError
extends SpeechError
Signals an error caused by an illegal call to a method of a speech engine. For example, it is illegal to request a deallocated Synthesizer to speak, or to request a deallocated Recognizer to create or new grammar, or to request any deallocated engine to pause or resume.

See Also:
